documents.document: So we're looking at; McGrath, Best, Furlong, Toner, Ryan, CJ, SOB, Heaslip, Murray, PJ, Henshaw, Ringrose, Earls + Zebo as wing & Kearney.
So Sexton out, POM & Trimble doubtful but O'Brien & Earls looking good?
@EmilyMortell Thanks! Hedged my bets and got a bit of both haha. We know Caroline is having a girl so we'll have another girl in 2ish weeks
I #ScrumTogether with @DoveMen to win #IREvFRA RBS 6 Nations tickets. Pick your match by 8pm & you could too https://t.co/dYBYmkCgWt
A Royal Rumble with no random surprise old school wrestlers? Sounds very disappointing
So my 9 month long prediction that I'd be welcoming a new nephew this month was wrong...first time for everything I guess 😏🎊🎉
Scrolling through Fbook & see headline - 'here's why UPS drivers never turn left and why you shouldn't either'. This is what we've come to.
@EmilyMortell just got the reveal on Olivia's dad...shit is going down
First time doing some decent barbell squats in a long long time. Feel like a king now. https://t.co/lICcVnHl45
Scandal is very Scandalous. All the time. https://t.co/pDw66nbc77
I #ScrumTogether with @DoveMen to win #IREvFRA RBS 6 Nations tickets. Pick your match by 8pm & you could too https://t.co/PJukapVOGt
@ColmODonoghue do you find it weird that the fire brigade liked your tweet?
The smell of smoke from that fire in the Dublin mountains has carried pretty far, looks quite big...
@IrishTimesSport possible bug - whenever I try paste the page as a link it redirects me to this site https://t.co/ToAWYVhYSR ?
Brilliant pic. Hartley's surly look, Jones' bemused expression & bruised eye. Looks like Hartley kicked 7 lumps of… https://t.co/3AiiLB9QJD
shocked and appalled Lego Batman received no Oscars nominations.
Exclusive footage of how Eddie Jones got his black eye before the Six Nations launch. https://t.co/PGqp5z5m4a
Special mention to whoever chose 'Kevin Taggs' as their Tag Rugby team name. https://t.co/Ywc7taXJkS
Six Nations season underway today, always something to look forward to in the new year. Reasonably confident for Ireland's hopes
To confirm the signings of Hanrahan, Farrell & Hart in one go is massive for Munster.3 of the brightest IQ overseas talents. Incredible work
Last week of January means payday is so close.. https://t.co/MGNbVbgMaZ
Sexton & Jackson only 2 fly halves - seems like Scannell will be 3rd choice option for opening rounds, risky with Sexton's injury profile
Tommy Bowe has been an incredible servant to Irish Rugby, but the value of him being in the squad when he's almost guaranteed not to play?
Disappointed for Ruddock/O'Donoghue but backrow too competitive & is bang on. Would have been good exp for Byrne/O'Loughlin to make it too
Never seen so many knock ons from Connacht as I have over the last two weeks.
Very nervy so far from Connacht. Could do with a big break, turnover or 3 points to give them a bit of confidence to build on. Poor so far
@KelvinOMahony he should make the extended squad at least, Trimble will too anyways...Conan Cj Heaslip POM JVDF and SOB backrow?
@KelvinOMahony earls, zebo, kearney, o'halloran. Trimble hasn't been great has he? Don't think Adam byrne is ready, so bit unsure
Conway playing the best rugby of his career lately, great to see. He should make Schmidt's squad tomorrow
I've now seen someone put Dan Biggar at 13 in their Lions team Vs. NZ on one of those stupid Facebook threads. Do you laugh or cry?
If Lancaster leaves Leinster, @BarackObama isn't up to much? Fair bit of managerial/leadership experience...
@VirginMediaIE hi Brian, I've attached 2 screens now (eps 6, 8, 18, 20 gone). This is on phone/registered tablet bu… https://t.co/X7kBoq8kPQ

The Purge 4 - The Trump Towers
https://t.co/ZbMfVL5kQR
Some poor performances but onwards & upwards - Wasps at home should be an excellent test of where we're at. Tough game with plenty to prove
Disappointing result but Castres the better side even if Leinster could have snuck it once or twice. They were underestimated & dogged..
@VirginMediaIE thanks brian,not at home now but think episodes 6 & 8 are missing from season 2? few more missing in that season too i think
@VirginMediaIE hi, question re ondemand - there seems to be a few random episodes missing from scandal boxset...is that an error?
Sean O'Brien still out is a bit of a worry. Leinster have a tonne of backrows but you'd like him to be getting a bit of gametime in Europe
@lemonsrbitter @conorgmcnamara he made his point well, just hope refs will take heed of that as opposed to Scotland continuing same shots
Murray's comments re; Glasgow tactics are 100% but has he made himself more of a target to wind up now V Sco? Don't trust refs to prevent it
Calum Clark signs for Saracens, as they continue to fill the void of gobshitery that Chris Ashton has left.
Just commented on @thejournal_ie: 'We want Sam to concentrate on his game' - Howley on call to change Wales captai - https://t.co/4CrhzCocmm
@rava_ian @paddylogan13 real pity. Even away from established names someone like Peadar Timmins would do well with that bit more exposure
Arno Botha signing for Ulster looks to confirm that they haven't lured any backrows from either Leinster/Munster, slightly disappointing..
Moriarty's #Sherlock return is already one of my favourite gifs of the year. Great comeback, even if it was disappo… https://t.co/pziHMmbzG1
Forgot how good Moriarty is on Sherlock, show misses him.
Can't wait for Munster & Leinster in the Champions Cup Final & Pro12 Final this season. *dancing salsa lady emoji*
Another very tense ending to an enjoyable game between two strong sides. #GLAvMUN
@paddylogan13 they'd be better off in the Challenge Cup, not at Champions Cup level at all. They're a guaranteed 9/10 points every year.
Kick on now Wasps and deny them they losing bonus!
Hard to watch that interview, much respect for fronting up like that! Chin up @JoeTomane29, best of luck next week.
Only getting on twitter now - how many stop it he's already dead jokes have been made??? #LEIvMON #ChampionsCup #RIPMontpellier
@Murray_Kinsella is it an odd call to have Cooney at 10/Ronaldson at 12 with Poolman on the bench or is he still struggling with an injury?
I am presuming if it snows overnight work everywhere is cancelled, shops are all closed and Dublin becomes a massive snowball fight.
Obama awarding Biden with the Presidential Medal of Freedom was quite touching & heartwarming. A nice moment during their sign-off.
Morgan Schneiderlin given the number 2...what the fuck Everton? https://t.co/ZBIsWaJqIA
Would like to see Leavy start at 6 with Conan off the bench for impact but still happy! Good to see Byrne & O'Loughlin on wings + Isa at 15.
Didn't think I'd ever agree with Trump, but he found the one way to unite the world - a universal hatred of BuzzFeed 'News'
still patiently waiting for Donald Trump to announce his new reality TV show.
The Golden Globes tends to drag...
How slick are the cast of Stranger Things? #GoldenGlobes https://t.co/a1qxbaMXWM
@tommycahir @threeredkings would also be great to see Cooney stay fit and get a run at first choice scrum half somewhere.
@tommycahir @threeredkings definitely room for a backrow from 1 to go to Ulster, they lack quality there. Could see conan doing well there
@BHHooker imagine it'll be Wood, Haskell & Hughes, but can see Itoje at 6 to make room for Launchbury in 2nd row Lawes..
@threeredkings him & Ah You is all I can think of. Interesting to see if Nucifora bolsters their pack with any Mun/Lein, seems a rare move
@threeredkings have many made the move from Mun/Lein to Ulster after establishing themselves at home province? Can't think of many..
Surely if James Hart does leave Racing after a year he'd be best off going to Ulster? Could be 1st choice instead of sitting behind Murray
Frustrating day out/minute out for James Haskell..
Warburton dropping captaincy makes perfect sense. Has struggled last few seasons, needs less pressure. AWJ also a better captain anyway..
Can we start a petition to rename the 'man of the match' award to the CJ Stander award?
Niall Scannell also having a nice game, some very good darts come line-out time.
Munster playing great, especially that 9/10/12 combo. But how shite are Racing? Embarrassing for the 2016 runners up to be nil at home.
How long are we giving it before we get a yellow card for Racing?
Dan Carter, protege of Ronan O'Gara called into the action very early. Not sure its ready for a game like this. #R92vMUN
#Pray4Connacht
@lionsofficial Murray with Youngs & Webb as the other scrum halves to travel 👍
Football clubs & social media just don't go together...cringe worthy https://t.co/IdbcqmdP0L
Unfair on Ruddock? Left arm up to bind but Zebre player led with head so no chance he'd get any arms around him? #LEIvZEB
Sexton 5 out of 5 from the tee, growing into the game as it goes too.
Some nice play by Leinster but disappointing handling errors & penalties. Need to get into that rhythm, bit disjointed atm #LEIvZEB
Ringrose & Henshaw haven't even played a full season together. This good now; imagine them in 5/6 years when they h… https://t.co/ixcQAbC6ax
Keatley out of the 23 entirely with Scannell to cover 10 in case of injury. Odd that Earls is behind Conway/O'Mahony or was he injured?
Schneiderlin could have been great at United if he got the chance & ran with it, seems to have passed him by though. Shame
Using Vicks VapoRub when you're sick.."2-4 times a day" https://t.co/jd23royQGq
@ColmODonoghue because leavy ruddock and jgp are shit second rate players xoxo
@ColmODonoghue is it not literally down to the fact there was two games with a 5 day turnaround?
@LeinsterRoyalty making it that far is an achievement in itself!
Learn basic Chinese for beginners - https://t.co/jt2uD9tNDr @Alexis_Sanchez
5 minutes in & you can already see Ryan Phillipe struggling to carry the show's ridiculous writing. This is wonderful
Decided to watch Shooter on Netflix when I saw 'assassination' in the blurb. 3 mins in - cheesy one liners and unnecessary violence. Unreal
First day back at work after the holidays. https://t.co/spCGTwfa9J
@threeredkings the newest addition to Leinster's matchday 23. https://t.co/Qmhxqtaivr
Any update on Stuart Olding?
Martial moving to Sevilla would be crazy. One of our best players last year & immense potential. Shouldn't be let leave either way.
Why must mince pies go into hibernation after Christmas?
@threeredkings as in I don't understand why there should be any bitterness about it other the some good old fashioned Irish begrudgery
@threeredkings as a Leinster fan I don't get any bitterness, we have both Kirchner & Nacewa on the books for 11/14/15..same thing really?
The O'Donovan brothers are the gift that just keeps on giving. Great cameo on The Graham Norton Show, looking forward to it!
You'd swear Leinster named their u16 development side the way some people are shiting on about their starting XV.
Home Alone will always be a Christmas Eve favourite, but it's long term effects on Macaulay Culkin's well-being is worrying.
